item.title: Segment Anything Model — SAM: A Game-Changer in Image Segmentation
item.description: Cupboard Segmented using Segment Anything Model by MetaAI — https://segment-anything.com/demo Introduction In recent years, the field of computer vision has witnessed remarkable advancements, thanks to the emergence of foundation models and their ability to generalize across various tasks. The SegmentAnythingModel (SAM) is a groundbreaking vision foundational model that has garnered significant attention in the computer vision community. Trained on an extensive dataset, SAM exhibits an unprecedented capability to segment objects in images and videos.
